docs.lead_paragraph: Russell Sage, nearly 90, and the possessor, according to general estimate, of a fortune of $80,000,000 or more, accumulated during a long career as one of the foremost figures in Wall Street finance, died at 4:30 o'clock yesterday afternoon at his country house, at Lawrence Beach, L.I. The cause of death was general debility and old age.

headline.main: RUSSELL SAGE DIES LEAVING $80,000,000; Famous Financier Borne Down by the Weight of His 90 Years. A MARVELOUS MONEY GETTER His Fortune So Invested That His Death Is Unlikely to Affect the Stock Market.
